name: populated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a place) having people living there: They don't want to run the risk of bombs falling on populated areas. They live in densely populated, racially segregated neighbourhoods. See
populate
More examplesFewer examplesWild animals are seldom seen in populated areas.Children who live in heavily populated city neighborhoods are more likely to contract asthma.The area used to be sparsely populated, but then farmers and loggers moved in.

lived in: densely populated cities
